articles.description: As Alia Bhatt quits Ramayana, here's a look at the B-town and south divas who may be the perfect Sita for the film while Ranbir Kapoor plays Ram and Yash will be Raavan in Nitesh Tiwari's directorial.
articles.content: Kangana Ranaut fans often heave praise for her, which she rightly deserves, and her fans once claimed that she is born to be Sita after the reports claimed she would be playing Sita in one of the fil… [+66 chars]
